recipes.label: Return from the Shadows of Memory?
recipes.startdescription:
I could beat against the walls of this waking nightmare until my fists were worn to the bone, and still I would not break free. Accursed purpose has drawn me here, and only once that purpose is seen to its end will I be able to leave.

[You cannot leave Sobibor until you complete the Main Objective.]

recipes.label: Return from the Shadows of Memory
recipes.startdescription: I have unmade the part of me that feared the one called Exile. Now, I must return from this demi-real nightmare to the waking world, where I might satisfy my vengeance at last.
recipes.description: Onwards.

recipes.label: Escape under the cover of chaos
recipes.startdescription: Blood runs in the streets and flames dance in the ruins - we have turned this city into an abbatoir. Vanishing amidst the chaos we have sown today would be all too easy.
recipes.description: I've set my sights on a new destination.

recipes.label: Chart a course from Kaunas?
recipes.startdescription: I must carve a path further west. What routes present themselves?
recipes.description: Here - a stepping stone to Berlin.

recipes.label: No Easy Roads Ahead

recipes.description: A step closer to Berlin. Ready for the march.
